00032 void TriangleRenderable::addTriangle(const hgeVector& vert1, const hgeVector& vert2, const hgeVector& vert3,
00033                      const hgeVector& uv1, const hgeVector& uv2, const hgeVector& uv3,
00034                      const hgeColor& color1, const hgeColor& color2, const hgeColor& color3,
00035                      const std::string& texture, const int& blendMode)
00036 {
00037     if (ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->GetTexture(texture.c_str()) == 0)
00038     {
00039         Utils::get()->writeToLog("Error, cannot load Texture [" + texture + "], aborting operation.");
00040         return;
00041     }
00042     else
00043     {
00044         addTriangle(vert1, vert2, vert3, uv1, uv2, uv3, color1, color2, color3,
00045                     ScriptManager::get()->getResourceManager()->GetTexture(texture.c_str()), blendMode);
00046     }
00047 }
00048 
00049 void TriangleRenderable::addTriangle(const hgeVector& vert1, const hgeVector& vert2, const hgeVector& vert3,
00050                      const hgeVector& uv1, const hgeVector& uv2, const hgeVector& uv3,
00051                      const hgeColor& color1, const hgeColor& color2, const hgeColor& color3,
00052                      const int& texture, const int& blendMode)
00053 {
00054     Triangle* tri = new Triangle();
00055 
00056     tri->vert1 = vert1;
00057     tri->vert2 = vert2;
00058     tri->vert3 = vert3;
00059 
00060     tri->uv1 = uv1;
00061     tri->uv2 = uv2;
00062     tri->uv3 = uv3;
00063 
00064     tri->color1 = color1;
00065     tri->color2 = color2;
00066     tri->color3 = color3;
00067 
00068     tri->textureHandle = texture;
00069     tri->blendMode = blendMode;
00070 
00071     triangles.push_back(tri);
00072 }

00074 const vector<Triangle*>& TriangleRenderable::getTriangles()
00075 {
00076     return triangles;

00079 const int TriangleRenderable::getNumberOfTriangles()
00080 {
00081     return triangles.size();

00084 void TriangleRenderable::clearTriangles()
00085 {
00086     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < triangles.size(); ++i)
00087         delete triangles[i];
00088     triangles.clear();
00089 }

00091 const double TriangleRenderable::getWidth()
00092 {
00093     double min = 0;
00094     double max = 0;
00095 
00096     if (triangles.size() > 0)
00097     {
00098         min = triangles[0]->vert1.x;
00099         max = triangles[0]->vert1.x;
00100 
00101         if (triangles[0]->vert2.x > max)
00102             max = triangles[0]->vert2.x;
00103         if (triangles[0]->vert3.x > max)
00104             max = triangles[0]->vert3.x;
00105 
00106         if (triangles[0]->vert2.x < min)
00107             min = triangles[0]->vert2.x;
00108         if (triangles[0]->vert3.x < min)
00109             min = triangles[0]->vert3.x;
00110 
00111         for (unsigned int i = 1; i < triangles.size(); ++i)
00112         {
00113             if (triangles[i]->vert1.x > max)
00114                 max = triangles[i]->vert1.x;
00115             if (triangles[i]->vert2.x > max)
00116                 max = triangles[i]->vert2.x;
00117             if (triangles[i]->vert3.x > max)
00118                 max = triangles[i]->vert3.x;
00119 
00120             if (triangles[i]->vert1.x < min)
00121                 min = triangles[i]->vert1.x;
00122             if (triangles[i]->vert2.x < min)
00123                 min = triangles[i]->vert2.x;
00124             if (triangles[i]->vert3.x < min)
00125                 min = triangles[i]->vert3.x;
00126         }
00127         return max - min;
00128     }
00129     else
00130         return 0;
00131 }

00133 const double TriangleRenderable::getHeight()
00134 {
00135     double min = 0;
00136     double max = 0;
00137 
00138     if (triangles.size() > 0)
00139     {
00140         min = triangles[0]->vert1.y;
00141         max = triangles[0]->vert1.y;
00142 
00143         if (triangles[0]->vert2.y > max)
00144             max = triangles[0]->vert2.y;
00145         if (triangles[0]->vert3.y > max)
00146             max = triangles[0]->vert3.y;
00147 
00148         if (triangles[0]->vert2.y < min)
00149             min = triangles[0]->vert2.y;
00150         if (triangles[0]->vert3.y < min)
00151             min = triangles[0]->vert3.y;
00152 
00153         for (unsigned int i = 1; i < triangles.size(); ++i)
00154         {
00155             if (triangles[i]->vert1.y > max)
00156                 max = triangles[i]->vert1.y;
00157             if (triangles[i]->vert2.y > max)
00158                 max = triangles[i]->vert2.y;
00159             if (triangles[i]->vert3.y > max)
00160                 max = triangles[i]->vert3.y;
00161 
00162             if (triangles[i]->vert1.y < min)
00163                 min = triangles[i]->vert1.y;
00164             if (triangles[i]->vert2.y < min)
00165                 min = triangles[i]->vert2.y;
00166             if (triangles[i]->vert3.y < min)
00167                 min = triangles[i]->vert3.y;
00168         }
00169         return max - min;
00170     }
00171     else
00172         return 0;
00173 }

00175 const hgeVector TriangleRenderable::transformPoint(hgeVector point, SceneNode* const user)
00176 {
00177     hgeVector parentPosition = user->getWorldPosition();
00178 
00179     double angle = atan2(point.y, point.x);
00180     double radius = sqrt(point.x * point.x + point.y * point.y);
00181 
00182     double rotation = Utils::get()->angleRadians(user->getWorldRotation());
00183 
00184     hgeVector finalPosition((cos(angle + rotation) * radius + parentPosition.x) * user->getWorldScale(), (sin(angle + rotation) * radius + parentPosition.y) * user->getWorldScale());
00185 
00186     return finalPosition;
00187 }
00188 
00189 void TriangleRenderable::render(SceneNode* const node, const hgeVector& screenPosition, Camera* const cam)
00190 {
00191     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < triangles.size(); ++i)
00192     {
00193         Triangle* tri = triangles[i];
00194 
00195         hgeVector vertex1 = transformPoint(tri->vert1, node);
00196         vertex1 = cam->convertToScreenSpace(vertex1);
00197 
00198         hgeVector vertex2 = transformPoint(tri->vert2, node);
00199         vertex2 = cam->convertToScreenSpace(vertex2);
00200 
00201         hgeVector vertex3 = transformPoint(tri->vert3, node);
00202         vertex3 = cam->convertToScreenSpace(vertex3);
00203 
00204         hgeVertex verts[3];
00205         verts[0].x = vertex1.x;
00206         verts[0].y = vertex1.y;
00207         verts[0].tx = tri->uv1.x;
00208         verts[0].ty = tri->uv1.y;
00209         verts[0].col = tri->color1.GetHWColor();
00210         verts[0].z = node->getZ();
00211 
00212         verts[1].x = vertex2.x;
00213         verts[1].y = vertex2.y;
00214         verts[1].tx = tri->uv2.x;
00215         verts[1].ty = tri->uv2.y;
00216         verts[1].col = tri->color2.GetHWColor();
00217         verts[1].z = node->getZ();
00218 
00219         verts[2].x = vertex3.x;
00220         verts[2].y = vertex3.y;
00221         verts[2].tx = tri->uv3.x;
00222         verts[2].ty = tri->uv3.y;
00223         verts[2].col = tri->color3.GetHWColor();
00224         verts[2].z = node->getZ();
00225 
00226         hgeTriple triple;
00227         triple.v[0] = verts[0];
00228         triple.v[1] = verts[1];
00229         triple.v[2] = verts[2];
00230         triple.tex = tri->textureHandle;
00231         triple.blend = tri->blendMode;
00232 
00233         SystemManager::get()->getHGEManager()->Gfx_RenderTriple(&triple);
00234     }
00235 }
